requests.name: oauth token with valid credential
requests.description: we should get valid response from apigee server

requests.name: oauth token with invalid credential
requests.description: we should get invalid credential and should be denied for access token

requests.name: get with invalid apigee oauth token and valid github token
requests.description: This should display the user following in github. we are using valid github token (encrypted in avault) and valid token from token from apigee (which is stored as global variable from oauth request)

requests.tests:
// valid connection
tests["Status code is 401"] = responseCode.code === 401;
requests.name: get with no token and valid github authorization
requests.description: this should respond with invalid token because we don't want any get operation without token

requests.tests:
// valid connection
tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
requests.name: get with valid apigee oauth token and invalid github authorization
requests.description: this should show valid response because we are using valid apigee token but no resoponse from github because I have passed wrong token to github.

requests.tests:
// valid connection
tests["Status code is 401"] = responseCode.code === 401;
requests.name: get with invalid apigee oauth token and valid github authorization
requests.description: this should respond with invalid access token because we don't want any get operation without valid token

requests.name: get with valid apigee oauth token and valid github token
requests.description: This should display the user following in github. we are using valid github token (encrypted in avault) and valid token from token from apigee (which is stored as global variable from oauth request)
